system.description: You create a number of semitangible, visible magical orbs called prying eyes. They are about the size of a human head and move at 30 feet per round. Each eye can see with darkvision 60 ft. and normal vision. They have no other senses. They observe and remember what they see and report back to you when they return. You can see through an eye by using a standard action. Each eye has AC 14, 1 hit point, and is subject to dispel magic. If an eye is destroyed, you are not notified. The eyes return to you when the spell ends or when you dismiss them.
system.target: Up to 1 eye per 2 caster levels
